messages.wronglink: Oops, looks like you have visited an invalid link.
messages.nofiles: Oops. Looks like there aren't any files available here.
messages.linkexpiredon: Sorry, the link has expired on {expiryDate}.
messages.shareboxfooter: ShareBox External File Sharing for Alfresco by

common.content_limit_exceeded: You are not allowed to access content beyond this folder.

upload.selectfiles: Please select the file(s) and click Upload.
upload.empty: {fileName} is empty. Empty files are not allowed to be uploaded.
upload.maxlimitreached: This folder has reached the maximum items allowed. Therefore you cannot upload any more files.
upload.uploadselectlimitexceeded: You have selected more files to upload than you are allowed within the current folder. You can only add {numberOfFiles} more file(s).
upload.uploadlimitnotice: You are allowed to upload {numberOfFiles} more file(s) in current folder.
upload.file_exists_error: A file with the same name {fileName} exists within the current folder. Please rename the file before uploading or choose a different file.
upload.max_item_limit_exceeded: Unable to complete upload. The maximum number of files and folders allowed for this folder has exceeded.

download.downloadzipunknownerror: There was an error downloading the Zip archive.
download.downloadzipsizeexceeded: Aborting Zip download as max content size was exceeded. You may still be able to download files individually.
download.downloadzippreparing: Preparing Zip download file... Download will start automatically once the file is ready.
download.description: Download the current folder and sub-folders as a ZIP archive
